content.prompt: Lorenzo de’ Medici’s interaction with the Duke and Duchess of Milan best illustrates which of the following social and cultural developments in Renaissance Italy?

choices.label: The rediscovery and popularization of the classical literary traditions of Greece and Rome
New debates about elite women’s role in the family and in society raised by works such as Baldassare Castiglione’s The Courtier
The success of New Monarchies in centralizing and unifying their states
The rising social prestige of the members of the commercial elite

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
